%%{ init: {
        "logLevel": "debug",
        'theme': 'light',
        'themeVariables': {
          'taskBkgColor': '#C5E1B4',
          'taskBorderColor': '#4d4d4d',
          'activeTaskBkgColor': '#F0DC82',
          'activeTaskBorderColor': '#4d4d4d',
          'doneTaskBkgColor': '#B2E6CE',
          'doneTaskBorderColor': '#4d4d4d',

gantt
    title Final Thesis Timeline
    dateFormat  DD-MM-YYYY
    tickInterval 1week
    todayMarker off
    axisFormat W%W %Y

    section Investigation
      Project scope definition :inv-scope, 14-10-2024, until inv-database
      Research Large Language Model frameworks :inv-llm_frameworks, 21-10-2024, 14d
      Compare Large Language Model Frontends :inv-llm_frontend, 28-10-2024, 7d
      Research containerization technology :inv-container, 10-11-2024, 21d
      Compare vector database solutions :inv-database, 19-02-2025, 14d
      Investigate OpenWebUI pipelines and functions :inv-functions, after inv-llm_frontend, 14d
      Literature review :inv-lit_rev, 24-11-2024, until inv-database

    section Design
      Decide on LLM runner technology :active, design-llm_runner, after inv-llm_frameworks, 14d
      Decide on frontend technology :active, design-frontend, after inv-llm_frontend, 7d
      Architecture diagram :active, design-diagram, after design-llm_runner, 7d
      Decide on web technology stack :active, design-technology, after design-diagram, 21d

    section Implementation
      Create "monorepo" repository :done, impl-repo, 21-01-2025, 7d
      Set up ollama container image :done, impl-ollama, after impl-repo, 14d
      Set up OpenWebUI container image and function build scripts :done, impl-openwebui, after impl-ollama, 35d
      Create orchestating "RAG" API :done, impl-rag_api, 02-02-2025, 18-04-2025
      Add toxicity detection microservice :done, impl-toxicity, 17-03-2025, 7d
      Connect frontend to backed via functions :done, impl-functions, after impl-openwebui, until report-results

    section Report
      Result gathering :crit, report-results, after impl-rag_api, 14d
      Outline :crit, report-outline, after report-results, 7d
      Writing :crit, report-writing, after report-outline, until report-revision
      Revision :crit, report-revision, 09-06-2025, 15-06-2025
repo_description: Repository holding the source code for my Bachelor's thesis in Data Science and Engineering
